summary: Iteration 38 - Verified all 5 requested bug fixes: 1) Tab mesi cedolini visibili e leggibili (abbreviati a 3 lettere: Gen, Feb, Mar...), 2) Dettaglio cedolino si apre cliccando su 'Vedi dettaglio', 3) Fattura view-assoinvoice mostra i dati correttamente (fornitore, importo, numero), 4) Endpoint auto-repair/verifica restituisce statistiche delle relazioni, 5) Endpoint auto-repair/globale esegue collegamento dati. All 8 backend tests passed.

test_1_cedolini_tabs_visible.description: All 14 month tabs visible (Gen, Feb, Mar, Apr, Mag, Giu, Lug, Ago, Set, Ott, Nov, Dic, 13e, 14e)

test_2_cedolini_tabs_abbreviated.description: Month tabs abbreviated to 3 letters as expected

test_3_cedolini_detail_modal.description: Clicking 'Vedi dettaglio' opens detail modal with employee name, stipendio netto, mese/anno

test_4_fattura_view_assoinvoice.description: Fattura view-assoinvoice returns HTML with fornitore, importo, numero, P.IVA

test_5_safe_float_handling.description: safe_float() in helpers.py handles various input types without errors

test_6_auto_repair_verifica.description: /api/auto-repair/verifica returns statistics: verbali, cedolini, fatture, veicoli

test_7_auto_repair_globale.description: /api/auto-repair/globale executes data linking and returns results

test_8_cedolini_mese_numeric.description: Cedolini mese field is numeric (1-14) for proper tab mapping

critical_code_review_comments: Cedolini.jsx correctly uses MESI.find(m => m.num === cedolino.mese) to map numeric mese to label
helpers.py safe_float() function properly handles None, string, and numeric values
auto_repair.py correctly implements relationship linking for verbali→driver, cedolini→dipendenti, fatture→fornitori
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 5 requested bug fixes verified: 1) Tab mesi cedolini now show 3-letter abbreviations (Gen, Feb, Mar...) with minWidth 70px. 2) Cedolino detail modal opens correctly showing employee name, stipendio netto, mese/anno. 3) Fattura view-assoinvoice endpoint works with safe_float() for proper number formatting. 4) /api/auto-repair/verifica returns relationship statistics. 5) /api/auto-repair/globale executes data linking. Auto-repair statistics: fatture 95.1% collegati, cedolini 93.4% collegati, verbali 1.9% collegati (low because driver_id needs manual linking via targa).
